content: 1. What type of sales system is shown in the description?

answers.text: a) Direct sales, pure online sales
b) Returning and resale
c) Reiner online sales
d) multi-channel system

content: 2. What is the main purpose of the institutional structure?

content: 3. What kind of sales and marketing strategy is used in the description?

content: 4. What role does the company play as management?

content: 6. What is the main difference between pure online sales and pure offline sales?

answers.text: a) Reiner online sales is always better than pure offline sales

d) Reiner online sales is always less successful than pure offline sales
